Statistic Calculations¶

Calculate summary statistics and individual statistics. This will result in the creation of several files:

  • Histogram plot of number of blocks

  • Histogram plot of number of links

  • Summary Statistics File (summary.csv)

  • File containing the network statistics of each individual CAM (CAMS.csv)

Summary_Stats.summary_stats(home_dir, output_dir)¶

Main function to create histogram plots, summary statistics, and calculate network measures for each CAM.

Parameters

  • home_dir – Full path to raw data e.g. ‘/home/user/Data/Clean’

  • output_dir – Full path to clean data e.g. ‘home/user/Data/Output’

Returns

None

network_calc.calc_density(df_blocks, df_links)¶
Calculate CAM’s network parameters using networkx:

density, diameter, degree centrality, node with highest degree centrality, triadic closure, eigenvector centrality, betweeness centrality

Parameters

  • df_blocks – Pandas dataframe containing CAM’s block information

  • df_links – Pandas dataframe containing CAM’s link information

Returns

density, diameter, triadic_closure, central_node, central_node_title, central_node_val, central_node_valence, central_node_val_eig, central_node_val_bet
